ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is a great class for beginners in Chinese studies. Students of both literature and history will benefit a lot from this class.

It is a course that helps you learn how to use essential tools for East Asian research. I would highly recommend this course because it is a very important course that teaches one how to conduct effective and rigorous research.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I will use a lot of Chinese primary texts in my dissertation. This class taught me how to find the primary sources, how to use the digital tools, how to take advantage of online databases, which are all extremely helpful for me.
I found it immensely helpful to apply the skills and tools learnt in this course to my own research.
